alert.note: Alert for Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Rosebud; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:29PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Musselshell, northern Yellowstone, northern Rosebud and northwestern Treasure Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 429 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Melstone, or 31 miles east of Roundup, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Melstone and Musselshell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for central and south central Montana. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern Montana.

area.areaDesc: Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Rosebud; Treasure
